comments:
Description:
Null value is not processed in getModel method.

Steps to reproduce:
I opened several reports and did some actions, then I decided to close all open files. I got NullPointerException.
I'm not sure what causes the NPE but it's obvious the getModel method doesn't process the situation with null value.
